comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: A William Phillips (1878-1968) was US Ambassador to Italy in the 1930s: in 1917 he was appointed assistant Secretary of State by Wilson: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Phillips_%28diplomat%29 His wife was the former Caroline Astor Drayton (1880-1965)--they married in 1910: www.nyhistory.org/node/21182
